problem.markdown:
>>Please perform all of the following actions; you will not be able to complete them all at once because many involve back and forth between you and the Axim team. <<
[x] Sign the individual CLA at https://openedx.org/cla [x] Send an email to cc-program-admins@axim.org with your *personal* (not work) email address. This is so we may draw up a personal CC Program Agreement between just you and Axim Collaborative. [x] Sign the DocuSign agreement(s) that is then sent to your personal email address. Please provide your full physical address (including country) when you sign (for example: 123 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 4V9, Canada).

choiceresponse.label: Please perform all of the following actions; you will not be able to complete them all at once because many involve back and forth between you and the Axim team.

checkboxgroup.choice: Sign the individual CLA at https://openedx.org/cla
Send an email to cc-program-admins@axim.org with your *personal* (not work) email address. This is so we may draw up a personal CC Program Agreement between just you and Axim Collaborative.

Sign the DocuSign agreement(s) that is then sent to your personal email address. Please provide your full physical address (including country) when you sign (for example: 123 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 4V9, Canada).
